reviews.title: Best way to experience a sailing sunset
reviews.text: Best way to experience a sailing sunset on the Whitsundays. Leaving from Airlie Beach with plenty of time to cruise out to enjoy a perfect sunset enjoy a drink or two (BYO) and savour the sumptuous array of nibbles provided. Limited numbers on the cruise to ensure you can enjoy the cruise in comfort.
reviews.author: David K

reviews.title: Perfect anniversary celebration
reviews.text:
We booked a sunset cruise on Wings as part of our wedding anniversary.
It could not have been more perfect.
The crew were super friendly, the vessel was very clean and tidy and a lovely table of nibbles was provided. Great value for money and we would highly recommend.
Rob and Emily
SE Qld
reviews.author: Rob & Emily

reviews.title: Forever memories
reviews.text: We had the best day out on Wings. Everything was 100% perfect. The boat is spacious with loads of seating options, the staff were fantastic. Definitely one for the forever memories bank.
reviews.author: Claire M
